#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int numberofDIGITS(int n)
{
    int num = 0;
    
    while(n > 0)
    {
        n /= 10;
        num++;
    }
    
    return num;
}

int sum(int n)
{
    int sum = 0;
    
    while(n > 0)
    {
        sum += n % 10;
        n /= 10;
    }
    
    return sum;
}

int main() 
{
	int t, N;
	int flag = 0;
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t-- > 0)
	{
	    cin >> N;
	    
	    int low = N - numberofDIGITS(N) * 9;
	    flag = 0;
	    
	    for(int i = low;i < N;i++)
	    {
	        int sum2 = i + sum(i);
	        
	        if(sum2 == N)
	        {
	            cout << i << endl;
	            flag = 1;
	            break;
	        }
	    }
	    
	    if(!flag)
	    {
	        cout << "NONE" << endl;
	    }
	}
	return 0;
}
